org.opentrafficsim.core.value.vdouble.matrix

Interface WriteDoubleMatrixFunctions<U extends Unit<U>>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - Unit of the matrix
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MutableDoubleMatrix, MutableDoubleMatrix.Abs, MutableDoubleMatrix.Abs.Dense, MutableDoubleMatrix.Abs.Sparse, MutableDoubleMatrix.Rel, MutableDoubleMatrix.Rel.Dense, MutableDoubleMatrix.Rel.Sparse

    public interface WriteDoubleMatrixFunctions<U extends Unit<U>>
    Methods that modify the data stored in a DoubleMatrix.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void normalize()
      Normalize the matrix, i.e.
      void set(int row, int column, DoubleScalar<U> value)
      Replace the value at row, column by the supplied value which is in a compatible unit.
      void setInUnit(int row, int column, double value, U valueUnit)
      Replace the value at row, column by the supplied value which is expressed in a supplied (compatible) unit.
      void setSI(int row, int column, double valueSI)
      Replace the value at row, column by the supplied value which is expressed in the standard SI unit.

    • Method Detail

      • setSI

        void setSI(int row,
         int column,
         double valueSI)
           throws ValueException
        Replace the value at row, column by the supplied value which is expressed in the standard SI unit.
        Parameters:
        row - int; row of the value to replace
        column - int; column of the value to replace
        valueSI - double; the value to store (expressed in the standard SI unit)
        Throws:
        ValueException - when row or column out of range (row < 0 or row >= rows() or column < 0 or column >= columns())

      • set

        void set(int row,
       int column,
       DoubleScalar<U> value)
         throws ValueException
        Replace the value at row, column by the supplied value which is in a compatible unit.
        Parameters:
        row - int; row of the value to replace
        column - int; column of the value to replace
        value - DoubleScalar<U>; the strongly typed value to store
        Throws:
        ValueException - when row or column out of range (row < 0 or row >= rows() or column < 0 or column >= columns())

      • setInUnit

        void setInUnit(int row,
             int column,
             double value,
             U valueUnit)
               throws ValueException
        Replace the value at row, column by the supplied value which is expressed in a supplied (compatible) unit.
        Parameters:
        row - int; row of the value to replace
        column - int; column of the value to replace
        value - double; the value to store (which is expressed in valueUnit)
        valueUnit - U; unit of the supplied value
        Throws:
        ValueException - when row or column out of range (row < 0 or row >= rows() or column < 0 or column >= columns())

      • normalize

        void normalize()
               throws ValueException
        Normalize the matrix, i.e. scale the values to make the sum equal to 1.
        Throws:
        ValueException - when the sum of the values is zero and normalization is not possible
